variable.name: ECGFUVTYP
variable.value: Screening
Semi-annual
Annual
Non-routine

variable.name: ECGBASENOVA
variable.comment: Use for comparison with a follow-up ECG Novacode.
variable.value: No significant Q waves and no significant ST-T abnormalities
Q wave MI with major Q waves
Q wave MI with moderate Q waves and with ST-T abnormalities
Possible Q wave MI w/moderate Q waves w/o ST-T abnormalities
Possible Q wave MI w/minor Q waves with ST-T abnormalities
Profound ST-T abnormalities without Q waves
Significant ST-T abnormalities without Q waves
Minor Q waves without ST-T abnormalities
Minor ST-T abnormalities
STD or TN score >= 20 in any lead group
Q score < 15 in all lead groups

variable.name: ECGFUNOVA

variable.name: ECGINCDNTNOVA
variable.comment: Based on serial ECG comparison. Reference: Rautaharju, P, et al. The Novacode criteria for classification of ECG abnormalities and their clinically significant progression and regression. J Electrocardiol. 1998 Jul;31(3):157-187.
variable.value: No significant Q waves and no significant ST-T abnormalities
Q wave MI with major Q waves
Q wave MI with moderate Q waves and with ST-T abnormalities
Possible Q wave MI w/moderate Q waves w/o ST-T abnormalities
Possible Q wave MI w/minor Q waves with ST-T abnormalities
Profound ST-T abnormalities without Q waves
Significant ST-T abnormalities without Q waves
Minor Q waves without ST-T abnormalities
Minor ST-T abnormalities
STD or TN score >= 20 in any lead group
Q score < 15 in all lead groups

variable.name: ECGSILNTMI
variable.comment: First occurrence of an evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.1 or 5.2. WHI-CCC does not count a silent MI occurring after a clinical MI.
variable.value: No
Yes

variable.name: ECGPOSMI
variable.comment: First occurrence of a possible evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.3 or 5.4. WHI-CCC does not count a silent MI occurring after a clinical MI.
variable.value: No
Yes
